trustfund:
TF054642-EFA FTI EDUCATION PROGRAM
            DEVELOPMENT FUND-SOUTH ASIA REGION

abstracts.cdata!:
This project paper provides an
            additional credit to the India Second Elementary Education
            Project. The additional credit will help finance the costs
            associated with additional and expanded activities to
            enhance the impact of a well-performing project for the
            Indian fiscal years of 2010-11 and 2011-12. It will also
            help to cover a financing gap in FY2009-10, as the initial
            International Development Association (IDA) credit which was
            designed to support FY2009-10 was fully disbursed in
            reimbursement of higher than expected FY2008-09
            expenditures. More specifically, the additional financing
            will enable expanded activities related increased access at
            upper primary level (grades 5-8), increased completion rates
            and improved learning outcomes for the full elementary cycle
            (grades 1-8), and enhanced ability to undertake national
            student learning achievement surveys in grades 3,5 and 8.
            The expected outcomes of these activities are a greater
            percentage of children attending and completing elementary
            education, and demonstrating satisfactory learning levels,
            across all socio-economic categories.
